        • crops.core.ops module

    crops.core.ops module¶

    crop_seq(INSEQ, segments, cut_type, terms=False)[source]¶

    Returns modified monomer_sequence without specified elements.

    Parameters

    • INSEQ (monomer_sequence) – Input sequence.

    • segments (intinterval) – Input preserving interval.

    • cut_type (str) – Additional header information.

    • terms (bool, optional) – If True, only terminal ends are removed, defaults to False.

    Raises

    ValueError – If intervals given lie out of the sequence.

    Return newchain

    Cropped sequence.

    Rtype newchain

    monomer_sequence

    croppdb(INSTR, INSEQ, segments, terms=False)[source]¶

    Returns modified gemmi.Structure without specified elements.

    Parameters

    • INSTR (gemmi.Structure) – Gemmi structure.

    • INSEQ (Sequence) – Input sequence.

    • segments (dict of intinterval) – Input preserving intervals.

    • terms (bool, optional) – If True, only terminal ends are removed, defaults to False.

    Return INSTR

    DESCRIPTION

    Rtype INSTR

    gemmi.Structure

    renumberpdb(INSEQ, INSTR, seqback=False)[source]¶

    Returns modified gemmi.Structure with new residue numbers.

    Parameters

    • INSEQ (Sequence) – Input sequence.

    • INSTR (gemmi.Structure) – Gemmi structure.

    • seqback (bool, optional) – If True, it additionally returns the Sequence with the gaps found in the structure, defaults to False.

    Return INSTR

    Renumbered structure.

    Return INSEQ

    Sequence with extra information about gaps, only if seqback==True.
